alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 9:10PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Logan County through 845 PM CDT... At 809 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pembroke to near Clarksville. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Russellville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Kentucky.
